top_comment.text:
From China to Costa Rica, from Mali to Malaysia, acclaimed singers and 
musicians have come together to spread a message of unity and solidarity: 
We are "One Woman."

Watch this brand new music video created for UN Women and share it with 
your friends to celebrate International Women's Day!﻿

top_comment.text:
This is lovingly dedicated to two loved ones who courageously deal with 
tremendous challenges daily, to each of you who do the same in your own 
way, and to all women everywhere. We are one woman, your dreams are mine, 
and we shall shine. Bless the good men who grow and glow with us. ﻿

comments.text:
In Kigali, she wakes up,
She makes a choice,
In Hanoi, Natal, Ramallah.
In Tangier, she takes a breath,
Lifts up her voice,
In Lahore, La Paz, Kampala.
Though she’s half a world away
Something in me wants to say …

We are One Woman,
You cry and I hear you.
We are One Woman,
You hurt, and I hurt, too.
We are One Woman,
Your hopes are mine.
We shall shine.

In Juarez she speaks the truth,
She reaches out,
Then teaches others how to.
In Jaipur, she gives her name,
She lives without shame
In Manila, Salta, Embu.
Though we’re different as can be,
We’re connected, she with me

We are One Woman,
Your courage keeps me strong.
We are One Woman,
You sing, I sing along.
We are One Woman,
Your dreams are mine.
And we shall shine.
We shall shine.

And one man, he hears her voice.
And one man, he fights her fight.
Day by day, he lets go the old ways,
One Woman at a time.
Though she’s half a world away,
Something in me wants to say.

We are One Woman,
Your victories lift us all.
We are One Woman,
You rise and I stand tall.
We are One Woman,
Your world is mine
And we shall shine.
Shine, shine, shine.
We shall shine
Shine, shine, shine.
We shall shine.
Shine, shine, shine.
comments.author: Pat Patty

top_comment.text:
*For International Women's Day: **One Woman*

This beautiful song is a rallying cry to inspire listeners to join the 
drive for #women's #rights and gender #equality. *One Woman* is written for 
UN Women, "the global champion for women and girls worldwide, to celebrate 
its mission and work to improve women's lives around the world."

To download this song and for more info visit song.unwomen.org.

#internationalwomensday #womensday #equalrights  ﻿

captions.text: In Tangier, she takes a breath,
Though she's half a world away
Something in me wants to say ...
You cry and I hear you.
You hurt, and I hurt, too.
In Juarez she speaks the truth,
In Jaipur, she gives her name,
Though we're different as can be,
And one man, he hears her voice.
And one man, he fights her fight.
Day by day, he lets go the old ways,
Though she's half a world away,
Something in me wants to say.
You rise and I stand tall.

title: One Woman: A Song for UN Women
